pageContext.claim: “Outrage is growing in the Great State of Minnesota where our Patriots are now having to fight for the right to say the Pledge of Allegiance. I will be fighting with you! @foxandfriends”
pageContext.analysis: The St. Louis Park City Council voted to stop reciting the Pledge of Allegiance at its biweekly meetings. That's it. That's what happened. No one is being barred from saying it in Minnesota.
